name: Hira
description:
An ICO-inspired isometric action shooter. Fight your way through different worlds and defeat monsters and bosses.

Credits:

Albanese Andrea, Antonioli Luca, Bissacco Filippo, Castriotta Andrea Giuseppe, Ciobotaru Carmen, Fioretti Davide, Galaverna Lucrezia, Leone Federico, Marchetti Jacopo Bruno, Matteucci Alfredo, Moro Loris, Saffirio Giorgio, Salati Jami, Schneeberger Alexio, Valenza Maurizio, Xu Yi Chen, Zambaldo Roberto
